source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003630_EMETSELCH<tab>Hmm. Fighting fit, I see. Keep up the good work.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003630_EMETSELCH……なるほど。
やはりあと数体倒さないと、なんとも言えないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003640_YSHTOLA<tab>You're plotting something.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003640_YSHTOLA<tab>何の話かしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003650_EMETSELCH<tab>Every hour of every day. But never you mind about that. As I have told you a thousand times before: I like to watch. Nothing more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003650_EMETSELCH厭だな、いちいち気にするなよ。
約束どおり手を貸して、約束どおり見ているだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003660_EMETSELCH<tab>Well! I would quit this place, and I suggest you do the same. There is yet work to be done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003660_EMETSELCHそれじゃあ、私は帰る。
お前たちも、さっさと帰って次に進むことだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003670_EMETSELCH<tab>Ah...there is a sight to bring a tear to the eye.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003670_EMETSELCH<tab>……これはまた、懐かしい光景だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003680_RYNE<tab>You recognize these scenes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003680_RYNE<tab>この壁画のこと、知っているんですか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003690_EMETSELCH<tab>That I do. Indeed, there was a time when anyone and everyone would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003690_EMETSELCH<tab>むかしむかしは、誰もが知っていたさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003700_EMETSELCH<tab>Until one calamitous day when the world was divided across ten and three reflections, sundering the land and all who dwelled upon it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003700_EMETSELCH世界が、原初世界と鏡像世界に分かたれたとき。
すべての命も14に分かたれ、
それぞれの世界で、別の存在として生まれ変わった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003710_EMETSELCH<tab>And the worst part? No one could remember it. Not really. Just fragments and fleeting memories of an achingly familiar world...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003710_EMETSELCHそうして、本来の世界を知る者はいなくなった。
……が、人はときに夢として、その光景を垣間見たのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003720_EMETSELCH<tab>A vision shared of a paradise lost, preserved only in song and scripture and paint...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003720_EMETSELCH知らないのに知っている、人類共通の夢。
昔は大層ふしぎがられて、絵に描かれたり唄にされたり、
まあ、いろいろ扱われたものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003730_EMETSELCH<tab>Once upon a time. Yet here we find ourselves again. To look, learn, and <var 1A 02 /var>remember<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003730_EMETSELCHそれも見なくなって久しいと思ったが……
こんなところで、またお目にかかるとはな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003740_YSHTOLA<tab>Then share with us the stories you know so well. We are listening.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003740_YSHTOLA詳しいわね。
ということは、描かれている内容についても？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003750_EMETSELCH<tab>Before the great sundering, there was one world. A world that knew naught but peace and prosperity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003750_EMETSELCH……世界が分かたれる前。
そこには栄えた文明があり、多くの命が生きていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003760_EMETSELCH<tab>Until it was faced with a crisis. Unprecedented, terrifying. Civilization found itself perched upon a precipice, staring into oblivion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003760_EMETSELCHしかし、理が乱れ、未曽有の災厄が発生。
文明は、命は、危機に立たされた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003770_EMETSELCH<tab>But through prayer and sacrifice, the will of the star was made manifest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003770_EMETSELCHその文明の人々は、祈りと犠牲によって、
星の新たな理を紡ぐもの……「星の意志」を生み出した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003780_EMETSELCH<tab>Zodiark was His name, and by His grace was the calamity averted.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003780_EMETSELCH名は、ゾディアーク。
それによって、災厄は鎮められた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003790_YSHTOLA<tab>Zodiark!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003790_YSHTOLA待って、ゾディアーク？
それって……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003800_EMETSELCH<tab>A savior mighty and magnificent, deserving of reverence and gratitude...one would have thought. Yet some thought otherwise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003800_EMETSELCHこうして災厄は過ぎたが、
ゾディアークという強大な力を巡って、人の意見は割れた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003810_EMETSELCH<tab>From the fears of these naysayers would rise Hydaelyn─She who was to serve as His shackles. To bind Him and hold Him in check.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003810_EMETSELCHそれを封じるべきとする者によって、
枷となるもの……ハイデリンが生み出された。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003820_EMETSELCH<tab>And so they fought, and they fought, and they fought. And in the end...Hydaelyn was victorious.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003820_EMETSELCHゾディアークとハイデリンは戦った。
結果は、ハイデリンの辛勝……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003830_EMETSELCH<tab>With all Her strength She smote Him─dealing a blow so devastating that it split the very fabric of reality. And thus was Zodiark banished and His being divided.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003830_EMETSELCHハイデリンが放った渾身の一撃で世界は分かたれ、
ゾディアークもまた、分断されて封印された。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003840_EMETSELCH<tab>That concludes today's lesson on long-forgotten history. Though I imagine your Mother would offer a rather contradictory account. As is Her wont.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003840_EMETSELCH……以上、忘れられた歴史の話だ。
信じるかどうかは勝手にしてくれ。
ハイデリンの言い分は、どうせ違うだろうしな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003850_THANCRED<tab>I'm sorry─I can only assume I misheard, but it sounded an awful lot like you were implying both Zodiark and Hydaelyn are not gods, but─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003850_THANCRED仮に……仮にその話が真実だとして。
それじゃあ、ゾディアークとハイデリンというのは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003860_EMETSELCH<tab>What? Not gods of the First? Is that what you thought these paintings depicted? Or...? Oh! Ohhh...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003860_EMETSELCHなんだ、それすら気づいてなかったのか。
あれは、この星にもとよりいた神なんかじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003870_EMETSELCH<tab>They are gods after a fashion, yes, but no different from the kind with which you are so intimately acquainted. Formed of faith and prayer, of conviction and devotion...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003870_EMETSELCHかつての人によって創られた、星の意志。
お前たちにわかりやすいように言うとだな……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003880_EMETSELCH<tab>The eldest and most powerful...of primals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003880_EMETSELCH<tab>最古にして、最強の「蛮神」だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003890_YSHTOLA<tab>You have spun quite a tale.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003890_YSHTOLAとてもじゃないけど、
今すぐ受け入れられる内容じゃないわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet you have not explained the role of the Ascians in all of this. How is it you are privy to ancient secrets lost to time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>それが妄言でないと言うのなら、知っているあなたは何者なの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003901_EMETSELCH<tab>(LAUGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003901_EMETSELCH<tab>クク…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003910_EMETSELCH<tab>Finally, <var 1A 02 /var>finally<var 1A 01 /var>, you ask the right question! And shrewd questions warrant honest answers...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003910_EMETSELCHやっと、ついに、それを問うか……。
私とは、アシエンとは何者か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003920_EMETSELCH<tab>We Ascians know because it is our history. Our story.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003920_EMETSELCH<tab>私たち、とくにオリジナルと呼ばれるアシエンはな……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003930_EMETSELCH<tab>It was we who summoned Zodiark─we natives of that sundered paradise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003930_EMETSELCHゾディアークを召喚せし者。
つまり、分かたれる以前の世界の人だよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003940_EMETSELCH<tab>Now do you see why we yearn for the Great Rejoining?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003940_EMETSELCH<tab>だとすれば、世界の統合にこだわっているのも頷けるだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003950_EMETSELCH<tab>For our world...for our people...for all creation to be made whole again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003950_EMETSELCH<tab>私は、世界を……人を……真なる形に戻したいのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003960_EMETSELCH<tab>Wouldn't you wish for the same?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003960_EMETSELCH<tab>当然の欲求だろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003970_RUNAR<tab>Ah, you are returned! And none the worse for wear, I see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003970_RUNARみんな……！
無事だったんだな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003980_YSHTOLA<tab>You needn't worry about us. What became of the Eulmoran soldiers, more importantly?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003980_YSHTOLAもちろんよ。
どちらかというと、心配なのはこの拠点の方だわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003990_RUNAR<tab>They turned tail and fled at the sight of the night sky.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_003990_RUNARそれなら、大丈夫。
ユールモア軍は、この空を見て完全撤退したみたいだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004000_RUNAR<tab>The Children of the Everlasting Dark have also retreated back to Woven Oath.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004000_RUNAR「常闇の愛し子」も、また洞窟の奥に引っ込んだよ。
あいつら、もう無理にオイラたちの祈りを否定できないさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004010_RUNAR<tab>Try as they might, they could not deny the truth of their own eyes...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004010_RUNARだって、みんな見たんだ。
本当の、天の暗き海を……命の行く場所を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004020_RUNAR<tab>The sunless sea of heaven, full of love and grace, where none need know pain or suffering.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004020_RUNAR暗き海は満たされる……。
穏やかな静けさと、温かな慈しみで。
汝の行く先に、悲しみと恐れはない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004030_RUNAR<tab>In that moment, when the sky's light began to wane, I knew our prayers had been answered.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004030_RUNAR……祈りは、ちゃんと届いてた。
そう感じたとき、言葉にできないほど勇気が出た。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004040_RUNAR<tab>...That we were doomed to face oblivion at life's end no longer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004040_RUNAR人の命は……きっと、ボロボロのこの世界でさえ、
ただ終わっていくだけじゃないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004050_RUNAR<tab>When first we met, I harbored certain suspicions about you. Now I see that I was right.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004050_RUNARなあ、あんたたちのこと、
ずっと不思議な人たちだと思ってたんだ。
でも、今回で納得がいったよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004060_RUNAR<tab>You are the Bringers of Shadow. The Warriors of Darkness. The saviors for whom we have prayed for so long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004060_RUNAR<tab>みんなは、「闇の戦士」だったんだな……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004070_YSHTOLA<tab>I suppose you're not entirely wrong...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004070_YSHTOLA<tab>馬鹿ね、それを聞く必要があって？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004080_YSHTOLA<tab>But we are not worthy of your reverence, nor have we any desire to be worshipped. If you would pray, pray for your children, that they may one day know a better world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004080_YSHTOLA「夜の民」の祈りは、誰かを奉るものじゃない。
過ぎていった人が紡ぎ、あなたたちが繋げていく、
命のための願いと知恵よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004090_RUNAR<tab>...I will do as you say. But please, let us at least hold a feast to celebrate your victory. You deserve that much.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004090_RUNARわ、わかってるよ。
でも……そうだ、せめて一度くらい、みんなを讃えて宴を……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004100_YSHTOLA<tab>I am sorry, Runar, but there is still much to be done, and scant time in which to do it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004100_YSHTOLAルナル……。
彼らは行くわ、次に成すべきことをしに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004110_YSHTOLA<tab>We must go─all of us. For we share the same path and the same fate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004110_YSHTOLAそして、私もまた、彼らとともに……。
それが魔女マトーヤの、本当の役目なのだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004120_RUNAR<tab>So be it. I ask only that you hold us in your hearts, as we will hold you in ours, now and ever after. By the boundless dark, this I swear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004120_RUNAR……わかった。
でも、みんなへの感謝は決して忘れないよ。
あの……美しい闇に誓って。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004130_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>So there's a light sealed inside you, is there? You wouldn't know it from the outside. You look the same as you ever did to me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004130_WARRIOROFDARKNESSお前の体に、光が封じられてる……か。
見たところ普通そうだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I must stay the course. For the others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>みんなを信じてる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>And what if that changes? What if it overwhelms me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>あふれたらどうしよう……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then I suppose there's naught to do but rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>とりあえず寝るしかない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>True enough. Packing up and going home isn't really an option, is it. If you don't face the music here, it'll only come and find you there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004140_WARRIOROFDARKNESS……まあ、そうだな。
ここで罪喰い討伐を投げ出しても、危機は去らないわけだしな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004150_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Damned if I know. It's not as if I can lift a finger to help myself, much less you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004150_WARRIOROFDARKNESSお、俺に聞くなよ……！
この状態じゃ、助けを呼んでやることすらできないんだぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004160_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Have faith in your friends. Look out for them, and hope that they look out for you. What more can you do?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004160_WARRIOROFDARKNESSだから……そうだな……
状況を知ってくれてる自分の仲間を、信じて、護る。
今はそれしかないんじゃないか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah, yes. If they're not asking you to fight they're telling you to rest. Which isn't to say they're wrong. You'll need your strength for what's to come.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS確かに、体には気をつけておけって言われたもんな。
寝るのと食うのは大事だ、俺もそう思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004180_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>...Think he was telling the truth? Emet, I mean. All that rot about Hydaelyn being no different from any other primal...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004180_WARRIOROFDARKNESSところで、エメトセルクの言っていたこと……
ハイデリンが創り出された存在だって話が、もし本当なら……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If so, what would that make Her “blessing”? Are we just slaves to Her will?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS俺たち「光の加護を受けし者」は、
ハイデリンのテンパードみたいなものなのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ahh─let's pay him no mind. Lies are the Ascians' stock-in-trade.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004200_WARRIOROFDARKNESSああいや……お前も知らないなら今はいい。
奴の話そのものが、
お前たちを揺さぶるための虚言だった可能性もある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Villains, heroes─all a matter of perspective, they'd have you believe. One man's fond memory another's waking nightmare...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS……正しいかどうかなんて、簡単にひっくり返る。
楽しかった思い出も、削り取りたくなるくらい、
憎くなる日がくるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Me, I'm no saint or savior─just another sinner. And I know damn well I'm in no position to judge...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004220_WARRIOROFDARKNESSだから、こんな俺はもう……
誰かを肯定も否定もすべきじゃないと思っていたが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004230_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>When I saw the people of Slitherbough look up at the sky and celebrate the return of the dark...felt good.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004230_WARRIOROFDARKNESSスリザーバウの奴らが、夜を見て感激していたこと。
……よかったなって、俺も思ったよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It was moments like that that I cherished─much more than the thrill of adventure. The quiet after the storm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004240_WARRIOROFDARKNESS冒険は楽しかったが、それと同じくらい、
戦ったあとに贈られる、誰かの想いが好きだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I always took comfort in that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004250_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>……それを思い出した、少しだけな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004260_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Garlemald...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004260_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>一方 原初世界 帝都ガレマルド――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004270_ESTINIEN<tab>What did the scouts have to report?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004270_ESTINIEN<tab>……どうだった、定時連絡は。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004280_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Several skirmishes, but nothing of consequence. The fighting seems to have taken its toll on both sides.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004280_SHADOWHUNTER今のところ、戦況に大きな変化はない。
何度か小規模な衝突を繰り返しているが、
同盟軍も帝国軍も、攻めあぐねているようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004290_ESTINIEN<tab>A stalemate, then. The Alliance has done well to hold the line for so long.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004290_ESTINIEN膠着状態か……。
兵力だけ見れば、同盟軍はよく耐えている方だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004300_ESTINIEN<tab>...But then they did have Ishgardian reinforcements.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004300_ESTINIENまあ、あの竜詩戦争を乗り越えた国も加わってるんだ。
そうでなければ困るさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004310_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Nevertheless, neither side has any appetite for a prolonged engagement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004310_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>だが、戦の長期化は、双方の望むところではなかろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004320_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>'Tis but the calm before the storm. And should the Empire choose to bring their full might to bear...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004320_SHADOWHUNTERこの停滞は、嵐の前の静けさともなり得る。
帝国が、一気に片をつけようとしたならば……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004330_ESTINIEN<tab>To say nothing of Black Rose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004330_ESTINIEN<tab>「黒薔薇」の投入もある……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004340_ESTINIEN<tab>All the more reason to hasten our search. How close are your people to identifying our next target?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004340_ESTINIENやはり、調査を急ぐべきだろう。
侵入の手回しは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004350_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Close enough. Though I have received some troubling intelligence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004350_SHADOWHUNTER無論、進めている。
……加えて、気がかりな情報を掴んだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004360_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>One of our generals posted to the Ala Mhigan front recently disappeared without trace from the battlefield at the Ghimlyt Dark.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004360_SHADOWHUNTER国境地帯ギムリトの戦場から、
帝国百人隊長がひとり、姿を消したのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004370_ESTINIEN<tab>Odd. Dead seems unlikely, fled less so. I wonder where he'll turn up...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004370_ESTINIEN敵前逃亡か、どこかで死体になっているか……
どちらにせよ、珍しい話ではないだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004380_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Were I a betting man, I would say <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var>─in the capital.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004380_SHADOWHUNTER確かに、姿を消したままであればな。
だが、最近になって、
そやつがこの帝都で目撃されたとなれば、話は別だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004390_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Not that any deserter who valued his life would contemplate returning. But a corpse might, given the right encouragement.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004390_SHADOWHUNTER敵前逃亡ならば、帝都に戻るような真似はすまい。
死んでいたならば……死体が戻ったということになろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004400_ESTINIEN<tab>In the manner of His Royal Remains, you mean?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004400_ESTINIENほう……。
つい最近聞いた話じゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004410_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Elidibus plainly has no need of a new host, so the question becomes, who?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004410_SHADOWHUNTER現在、ゼノスを騙っていると思われる、
アシエン・エリディブス……。
同様に、いずれかのアシエンが百人隊長の体を得たか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004420_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>It may be that another player has joined the game.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004420_SHADOWHUNTERあるいは、まだ我らの知らぬ駒が、
盤上に置かれているのやもしれぬ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004430_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Something to consider, at any rate. But come, there is work to be done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004430_SHADOWHUNTERこの件についても、引き続き追わせている。
……我らも行くとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004440_ZENOS<tab>These bloodless games make for poor sport.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004440_ZENOS…………なるほど。
ずいぶんとつまらぬ戦になりかけているな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004450_ZENOS<tab>Mayhap if Father... Nay. I am a stranger to him in this body.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004450_ZENOS父上も……いや、この体では赤の他人か。
情のひとつもわかぬのは、それゆえとしておこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004460_ZENOS<tab>Besides, there is but one hand that can make me whole again. My enemy...my friend...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004460_ZENOSそうだ……俺を俺と成せるのは、今やあの男のみ……。
我が猛き獲物……我が友よ…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004470_ZENOS<tab>Besides, there is but one hand that can make me whole again. My enemy...my friend...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004470_ZENOSそうだ……俺を俺と成せるのは、今やあの女のみ……。
我が猛き獲物……我が友よ…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004480_ZENOS<tab>I know not what entertainment occupies you, but if you will not clear the way for me, then I shall seize the reins of fate once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05002_004480_ZENOSいずこかで、爪は研げたであろうな？
貴様が道を拓かんとするなら、
俺もまた……宿命を、跪かせようぞ。
